mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.user_id, u.name as username, b.title, b.read_count, b.write_date, b.update_date from board b join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT b.id, b.user_id, u.name as username, b.title, b.read_count, b.write_date, b.update_date from board b join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, title, content, read_count, write_date, update_date) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
